lead_paragraph: By piecing together scraps of information that reach these shores, Drs. Gustav Egloff and P.M. Van Arsdale, two well-known oil chemists, managed to present to the American Chemical Society a picture of Europe's oil problems which is as good as we can expect. From Spitzbergen to Naples, from Moscow to Paris, there is a dearth of motor fuel.
abstract: Ed on s to Amer Chem Soc on Eur oil supply
